
# Firebase Connection


## we have two environments

### 1. UAT

### 2. PROD


## diplayed app name

### english
android\app\src\main\res\values\strings.xml

### turkish
android\app\src\main\res\values-tr\strings.xml


not: android\app\src\main\AndroidManifest.xml dosyasında app_name değerini değiştirebilirsin
also use         android:label="@string/app_name"
